scripts.prepare: python3 -m venv ../../python/xgboost_model/venv && ../../python/xgboost_model/venv/bin/python -m pip install --upgrade pip && ../../python/xgboost_model/venv/bin/python -m pip install -r ../../python/xgboost_model/requirements.txt && ../../python/xgboost_model/venv/bin/python ../../python/xgboost_model/train_model.py
